meanings.definition: To serenade with a noisy mock serenade.
meanings.sent1: The group of friends started shivareeing outside the window to celebrate the birthday.
meanings.sent2: The neighbors were shivareeing loudly under the balcony last night.
meanings.sent3: The cats decided to join in the shivareeing, adding their meows to the chorus.
meanings.sent4: The sound of laughter and music filled the air, shivareeing through the night.
meanings.sent5: The children were shivareeing joyfully, creating a festive atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The town square echoed with the shivareeing of the marching band.
meanings.sent2: The shivareeing from the street performers drew a crowd of curious onlookers.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected shivareeing from the parrots in the park made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The distant sound of shivareeing carried through the night, adding to the city's charm.
meanings.sent5: The playful shivareeing of the children brightened up the dull afternoon.
